about.article: Located in beautiful Los Angeles, CA, USA, EVOGLE, LLC is a high-tech environmental company. The company focuses on innovative high-technologies development on environmental monitoring, environment protection, and environment improvement. The company invented iEQBox: intelligent Environmental Quality Box, which is a state-of-the-art and state-of-the-practice product for air qualify monitoring, air big data application, and intelligent decisions for environment protection and improvement. The iEQBox has been applied in LA, CA, USA and Beijing, China.
